name: You're Cookin', Good Lookin'!
description:
You're Cookin', Good Lookin' is a 2D fighting game!

This game was created for Yuri Jam 2022. Mio and Beatriz are a married couple who, despite both being professionals in the cullinary industry, are fighting to decide who's cooking dinner tonight!

Project Lead/Music/Sound Design by: @Dom

Game Design/Prog by: @NoahRapetti

Programming by: @SunnySideUp

Chara/Anim/Prog by: @Piroporopi

Background/Comic Art by: @jenny mhulla

Voice Acting by: @Abby

Guitar and Foley Assistant: @Charlie & @Thade

Current features:

  • Versus (Vs CPU only)
  • Mouse & Keyboard control

Known issues:

  • Loading to Fight scene is long
  • Block bug
  • Projectiles bug
